modules.description: Handles SPF (Sender Policy Framework) validation for email domains using libspf2. Processes DNS queries and evaluates email headers against policy records. Supports checking sender authenticity and preventing email spoofing in mail server implementations.

The module provides SPF validation operations for email authentication, focusing on checking HELO and MAIL FROM addresses against SPF records. It processes network addresses, DNS configurations, email headers, and domains to enforce SPF policies and extract validation outcomes. Use cases include verifying sender legitimacy, preventing email spoofing, and generating detailed results for compliance with authentication protocols.
